overview:
What is DesiCrush?

Rated #1 on Google for “Indian Dating”

Over 25k members without ANY marketing

DesiCrush is an online MODERN Indian dating service. DesiCrush was developed to bridge the gap between more traditional marriage-focused sites and mainstream sites. We also offer events such as speed dating and many other singles themed gatherings. Although we are based in the US, DesiCrush caters to South Indians worldwide.

Our mantra is “Modern vs Traditional”

Desi [d̪eːsi] refers to the people, cultures, and products of the Indian subcontinent. Desi countries include India, Nepal, Pakistan, Bangladesh and Sri Lanka. There are large Desi populations in the UK, US, Canada, South Africa, Mauritius, Singapore,Guyana, Fiji, Australia, Trinidad and Tobago and other countries.

There are many matrimonial websites out there, but there are almost NO modern indian dating sites that combine social integration with what the current generation of Indians are looking for. DesiCrush provides that platform.

We have developed a web platform found here:
